title: Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform - Wikipedia
snippet: In 2020, there were according to the Ministry 586 public health establishments in Algeria. There are 69,948 beds in CHU, EHU, EH, EHS, and EPH establishments and 6,584 beds in community hospitals (EPSP).
